title: 安装minecraft forge后optifine失效了,怎么办
author: a1234567b9

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 那你完全可以在安装完forge再装optifine嘛

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 请说明MC版本，和所有安装的MOD，我再给你安装顺序
